reviews.review: it is really nice game scary but cool

Great game fun to play with friends.

If you play killer and you act like a b*tch and camp n sh*t I hope from the bottom of my heart that someone very very close to you gets a brain tumor that explodes in their head.
The gameplay loop if kind of fun but it doesn't make up for how ugly and at points poorly made the whole thing is.

Where do I start? The cheating is horribly out of hand. It's every other game someone is using a cheat of some kind or another. I tried to call it out in the forums and got banned within 7 minutes of posting. The game is extremely survivor sided even though it's a 4v1 so you'd think that the killers would be far stronger but that isn't even remotely the case. This game is a cash grab and no changes are ever gonna be made to balance it. Don't waste your time or money on it.

the game is great and super fun but what make me disappointed they ban toxic people but they don't ban hackers . i'm glad they ban toxic people but sometimes it's unfair that's what happened to me when group of Survivors are friends losing because they are bad they start being toxic more than csgo or rainbow six they talk about your mom and they said N word and being Racism when you so i only said shut up or get lost or toxic i got 5 days ban . because the guy with his friends reported me and i only the killer reported the guy him self who being toxic to killers . i feel the ban is so random i hope the devs double check before they ban.

Sin contar el hecho de que se compraron servidores y ahora podÃ©s jugar a menos de 180ms, cosa que era normal.

TL;DR: Dead by Daylight evolucionÃ³ a travÃ©s de cambios pequeÃ±os y sigue haciÃ©ndolo, sin duda para bien. Ahora sÃ­ que llevan un Pretty good job so far.

gut gam i rely liek it

The simplicity and focus on teamwork aswell as outplay potential can be great. However some exploits can give the killer a very bad time. Getting into higher ranks doesnt take long, but when you are there the only difference is the lack of originality. In higher ranks the game is heavily influenced by meta perks/add-ons, that is the only thing that sets it apart, aside from overall game knowledge of course. All in all the game is  nice and I have been enjoying it on both the PS4 and PC.

If your looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if your looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:
1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing
